profile:
Save thousands by dealing directly with a manufacturer! Canadian Choice Windows and Doors Inc. is a leading manufacturer of windows in Canada, serving Ontario. Canadian Choice Windows and Doors offers a huge selection of replacement windows including energy efficient windows, vinyl windows, casement windows, awning windows and bow and bay windows.

Canadian Choice Windows and Doors has been serving Toronto, Richmond Hill, North York, Markham, Mississauga, Oakville, Burlington, Hamilton, Kitchener, Cambridge, Niagra Falls and the surrounding areas as well as in Calgary, Edmonton, Winnipeg and Northern Ontario. 

Why is Canadian Choice Windows and Doors your best solution for window replacement?

1. No Pressure Estimate: take your time & make informed decision

2. Save Money: Energy Star windows will reduce your energy bill by 30 %

3. Professional Installation: flawless installation and thorough clean up by courteous installers

4. High Quality: The highest quality windows in the industry, featuring foam injected honey comb structure.
 
5. Easy Financing: Financing solutions to fit anyoneâ€™s lifestyle

6. Maximum Comfort: low-E coating to reflect summer sun and retain winter heat with our Cardinal Smart Glass system.

7. Zero Maintenance: our windows are easy to clean from within the home and will never fade or discolor

Canadian Choice Windows and Doors is your smartest solution for window and door replacement.

profile:
At Reliance Yanch, the safety and well-being of both our Customers and our Team Members is always our top priority. We are actively monitoring the Coronavirus (COVID-19) situation and are taking precautionary measures to aid in keeping our communities safe. We have implemented strict safety protocols to provide both our Customers and Team members with peace of mind during this challenging time. We continue to provide the exceptional customer experiences we are so well known for and want you to know that we are here for you when you need us.

To help with prevention, we are taking the following precautionary measures to protect our Customers.

Our Team Members have been equipped with an ample supply of:

* Hand sanitizers
* Disinfectant wipes
* Masks
* Single-use gloves
* Boot covers

We know that this is a difficult time for all and we want you to know that we will be there for you and are taking all the necessary precautions to keep you and your family comfortable and safe.


Reliance Yanch Home Comfort is able to provide a wide variety and depth to our range of HVAC services. We have become the leading source for heating, air conditioning and home comfort systems in Central Ontario including Simcoe County, southern Georgian Bay and the Muskokas. Our mission is to be the leading service and Installation Company in residential heating and air conditioning. 
From our locations in Barrie and Collingwood, we offer a full range of home comfort equipment and services, from design and installation to service and repair. We are specialists in the replacement of residential heating, air conditioning and domestic hot water systems including natural gas, electric, propane and geothermal systems.

Furnaces, Air Conditioners, Water Heaters, Air Purifiers, Boilers, Humidifiers, Ductless Air Conditioners 
888-837-1451 is a TOLL FREE No., please feel free to contact!!

profile:
Aeroseal Tech specializing in Aeroseal Technology and other ways  to improve Air Quality, Air Volume and Velocity for residential and commercial buildings. We take on jobs ranging from simple to complicated and perform all work with the utmost attention to detail and customer service. This way we are able to achieve the best results for our customers which we guarantee for 10 years!
Aeroseal Duct Sealing is a patented breakthrough technology that tackles leaks from the inside out. Aeroseal software allows the technician to accurately measure the duct leakage in residential homes and commercial buildings. The Aeroseal process puts escaping air under pressure and causes polymer particles to stick first to the edges of a leak, then to each other until the leak is closed.

The technology was developed within the Indoor Environment Program at Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory, whose IAQ scientists tested it. The research was funded by US Environmental protection agency, US dept. of Energy, Electric Power Research Institute and California Institute of Energy and Environment.

The University of California was granted initial patents in 1996 and 1999, and Aeroseal holds an exclusive license to the technology.

profile:
Breathe Easy. We Are Here for All Your Heating & Cooling Needs!

There are many reasons to confidently choose Aire Serv as your provider of heater and air conditioning servicesâ€”both commercial and residential. With more than 200 locations throughout the United States and Canada, Aire Serv is a trusted name in the field of heating and air conditioning installation, maintenance, and repair. We are proud of our reputation for putting clients first and getting the job done right the first time, every time.

Aire Serv of Vaughan is committed to delivering the right AC and heating system services at the right prices. We do not rush through our work and make subpar results. Our professional service technicians take the time to perform each job 100% accurately and to the utmost industry standards of quality, maximizing the value you get out of your dollars.


We Offer 24 / 7 Emergency Service

When your AC goes out in a heat wave or your furnace breaks down in an ice storm, you need emergency service fast! Rest assured and know that Aire Serv is there for you, 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, with live dispatchers, prompt service, and no charge for overtime, weekends, and holidays. Itâ€™s good to know Aire Serv is always just a phone call away!

profile:
Our Mission at Schomberg Sheet Metal is to improve the quality of life for our customers, employees, suppliers and communities through our passion for serving others. For over 30 years our family owned and operated company has continued to provide exceptional levels of service to Greater Toronto and South Simcoe regions.

Our passion for serving others begins with a passion for what we do. Each member of our dedicated team takes great pride in their craft, whether they are working on furnace repairs, or air conditioner installations. All our technicians continue to sharpen their skills with specialized training. We are committed to adding value to our customers, from helping demystify government rebates to offering expert advice and taking time to explain how products work in your home.

Our philosophy is different from other HVAC companies: because we are family-owned we treat our customers as such and each job is handled with the expert care as if it were our own home. We believe in working hard to earn our customers trust and keeping it.
